title: Nice raw t206 Cobb's and Young's
author: Phillies*phan

posts.post_title: Nice raw t206 Cobb's and Young's
posts.post_content:
These cards are unaltered and nice.  I just need the money now instead of sending them to PSA.  Check or Money order preferred.

Cobb red-light wrinkles top left and bottom right, 1/2" crescent moon above head.- $1200
 
Cobb bat off- no creases but bottom left has the corner paper missing.-$1200

Young hand showing- No creases, nice.-$1300

Young portrait- No creases-$900
